name: Shield

casting_options.description: Raise a magical shield of force; +1 circumstance bonus to AC until your next turn. Can use Shield Block reaction (Hardness 5). After Shield Block, spell ends and can't recast for 10 minutes.

duration: until the start of your next turn

casting_options.description: Each creature must Reflex save; success: invisibility negated for 2 rounds. Fail: dazzled 1 min, invisibility negated 1 min. Crit fail: blinded 1 round, dazzled 10 min, invisibility negated 10 min.
